item.description:
This is part of the Onset Summer of Love Concert Series... Onset is always a fun  place to visit in the summer. Bring the whole familty. We will probably go out after for a beverage or two. There is plenty of grassy areas if you'd like to bring a picinic or frisbee.

This is a Kid Friendly event - however Alcohol will be served.

Oh yeah - it's free !
item.how_to_find_us: When facing the stage - off to the left - 2 or 3 tables from the front

group.name: South Shore Hike, Bike & Social Club

item.name: Shattered - Rolling Stones Tribute Band at the Onset VFW
